      • $

        public static BodyGravityAction $(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body body,
                  float gravityOffset,
                  boolean randomise)
        Get instance from pool.
        Parameters:
        world - The Box2D world reference.
        body - The Box2D body reference.
        gravityOffset - The gravity increment from the world setting to apply.
        randomise - Whether to randomise across the offset value to get more realistic behaviour.
        Returns:
